clinical_study.brief_title: Trial of R-GemOx Regimen in Previously Untreated Elderly Patients With DLBCL.
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Single-arm, Open-label, Phase 2 Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of R-GemOx Regimen as First-line Treatment in Elderly Patients With Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma (DLBCL).

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate efficacy and safety of GemOx(Gemcitabine and Oxaliplatin) combination with rituximab(R) as first-line treatment of elderly patients with DLBCL

detailed_description.textblock:
Previous studies showed that the combination of rituximab, gemcitabine and oxaliplatin (R-GemOx) achieved high efficacy with a low toxicity profile in relapsed and refractory DLBCL. This regimen might be considered a putative treatment option for elderly patients. To our knowledge, the efficacy and safety of R-GemOx when given as first-line therapy in elderly patients with DLBCL remains unknown. The investigators therefore developed a two-weekly regimen of rituximab combined with GemOx regimen as first line treatment in elderly DLBCL and investigate its efficacy and safety.
Primary Outcome Measures:
- overall response rate
Secondary Outcome Measures:
- progression free survival
- overall survival
- safety and toxicity
Enrollment: 60 Study Start Date: August 2012 Primary Completion Date: Dec 2015

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of 3 cycles and 6 cycles of R-GemOx regimen(each cycle is 14 days)
primary_outcome.description: overall response rate after 3 cycles and at the end of R-GemOx regimen.

secondary_outcome.description: from date of inclusion to date of progression, relapse from response, or death from any cause or last follow-up.
from the date of inclusion to date of death, irrespective of cause or last follow-up.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 30 days following the last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: All the treatment related adverse events was evaluated according to common terminology criteria adverse events(CTCAE) version 4.0

arm_group.description: Rituximab: 375 mg/m2 IV day1, Gemcitabine 1g/m2 IV day 2, oxaliplatin 100mg/m2 IV day2(every 14 days)
